snippet.title: Crimes Against Slimes Demo Trailer
snippet.description:
Crimes Against Slimes is a game where fight against the never-ending slime hordes, gain upgrades as you level up, and do whatever you can to survive as long as you can.

Crimes Against Slimes is a survival game where all you can do is run away and shoot the enemies that constantly hunt you down. At first, the slime horde might seem unbeatable but the stronger you get the more you formidable an opponent you become!
